metadata.name: BLEAK REFLECTIONS
metadata.description: A mood or state of mind characterized by feelings of sadness, despair, and hopelessness. In this state, one tends to see the world and their own experiences in a negative and depressing light, often focusing on the negative aspects of their life rather than the positive. Bleak reflections may result from a difficult life event, such as a loss or disappointment, or from a chronic emotional or psychological condition, such as depression. The thoughts and emotions experienced during bleak reflections can be overwhelming and can lead to feelings of isolation and loneliness.
